data.title: Reps from DHS, the FBI and the ODNI met with tech companies at Facebook to talk election security
data.text: Representatives from the Federal Bureau of Investigation, the Office of the Director of National Intelligence and the Department of Homeland Security met with counterparts at tech companies including Facebook, Google, Microsoft and Twitter to discuss election security, Facebook confirmed.

data.title: Here’s A Reason To Own Microsoft’s Stock: Its Red-Hot Cloud Computing Business
data.text: Microsoft and its stock is in growth mode and it has its cloud computing to thank.

data.title: Microsoft buys start-up Movere to help businesses move work to the cloud
data.text: Microsoft is investing in an area that could lead to growth at Azure, which is trying to catch Amazon Web Services in public cloud.

data.title: Microsoft acquires Seattle cloud migration startup Movere to help companies transition to Azure
data.text: Microsoft today announced the acquisition of Movere, an 11-year-old Seattle-based cloud migration startup.

data.title: Microsoft Stock Can Run Further Amid Azure Cloud Growth: Strategist
data.text: Microsoft stock has been on a strong run this year, but Nancy Tengler of Tengler Wealth Management expects the stock to continue to move higher amid strong growth in its Azure cloud business.

data.title: 3 Big Stock Charts for Wednesday: Microsoft, Noble Energy and Johnson Controls
data.text:
Stock charts of MSFT, JCI and NBL are at pivotal junctures as we begin the midpoint of the week.
